name: Robo World
description:
Robo World is a free Top Down PVE Shooter

Story: You and some scientists tried to make robots to help the world, but it backfired and released infected robots that killed everyone but you. Use your abilities to take down the robots and save the world.

Controls:
WASD - Move
LMB - Shoot
Q - SloMo Ability
E - Heal Ability
F - Dig Up X Marks the Spot
Ctrl + Shift + R - Reset
Ctrl + U - Enter Different Username

4.7 Patch Notes:

-"40% Lower Slot Roll Cost" Modifier price reduced from 2 to 1 Reset Coins-

-"50% Lower Abilites Cost" Modifier price increased from 1 to 2 Reset Coins-

-SloMo Ability price reduced from 1500 to 1250 Robo Dollars-

-Centered the Spawtation health bar and time countdown-

-Added support for OBS recording/streaming-

-Prices are now displayed correctly after buying the 50% Lower Ability Cost Modifier-

-Reduced TNT explode radius by 75 pixels-

-Fixed the Modern Camo not being the same in the Inventory and in missions-

This Updates Mystery Camo is Equilizer
